div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 130 Argos, 1966 Burial: early 3rd cent. B.C. Contents: 37+ AR Boeotia:1 st. Sicyon: 3 st. CNG 82 (2009) lot 531 Elis: 1 st. Argos: 31+ triob. Stymphalus: 1 st. Disposition: priv. colls., Athens Hackens, Antidorum W. Peremans, p. 92, note 2 Later information from Hackens, who will publish the find, adds 1 triob. of the Achaean League and 1 triob. of Pellene to the list above
